Title: Sworn Enemies
Description: Countries that have consistently and vocally opposed Israel's existence, frequently supporting anti-Israel resolutions and maintaining hostile diplomatic stances. Examples include Iran and Syria.

Title: Hostile Critics
Description: Countries that criticize Israel regularly and often align themselves with anti-Israel positions but do not directly seek its destruction.

Title: Adversarial Critics
Description: Countries that maintain diplomatic relations with Israel but are often openly hostile towards its policies, particularly concerning the Palestinian territories.

Title: Cautious Partners
Description: Countries that maintain formal diplomatic relations and cooperate with Israel but are also cautious due to regional or domestic sensitivities.

Title: Active Allies
Description: Countries that actively support Israel both politically and economically, maintaining a friendly diplomatic relationship.

Title: Cordial Relations
Description: Countries that maintain friendly diplomatic relations with Israel but are less vocal in their support compared to Active Allies.

Title: Indifferent or Neutral
Description: Countries that remain largely neutral towards Israel and do not regularly comment on Israel-related international matters.

Title: No Relations
Description: Countries that do not maintain any formal diplomatic relations with Israel, often due to regional alliances or domestic political reasons.
